liveOnly.label: Live Only Mode
liveOnly.tooltip: True if you want it to only run when you are live

permission.label: Permission level
permission.tooltip: Set the permission level for the command

volume.label: Volume
volume.tooltip: Set the volume power for the playing sounds.

costs.label: Cost to play a sound
costs.tooltip: Set the cost for this command.

onCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on cooldown for $cd seconds!
onCooldown.label: Cooldown Response
onCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on cooldown. 
 $user = Username
 $cd = time remaining

onUserCooldown.value: $user, $command is still on user cooldown for $cd seconds!
onUserCooldown.label: User Cooldown Response
onUserCooldown.tooltip:
The message that the bot will display when the command is on user cooldown. 
 $user = Username
 $cd = time remaining

responseNotEnoughPoints.value: $user you have only $points $currency to pull the lever.
responseNotEnoughPoints.label: Not enough points
responseNotEnoughPoints.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user doesn't have enough points.
 $user = Username
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play sound 
 $sound = Sound name

responseWrongSound.value: $user the sound you've tried to play doesn't exist.
responseWrongSound.label: Sound doesn't exist
responseWrongSound.tooltip:
Message that will be posted if the user tries to play a sound that doesn't exist.
 $user = Username
 $currency = Name of Currency
 $cost = Cost to play sound 
 $sound = Sound name
